snippet.title: You First - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
You First is a live-action romance visual novel available now for iOS and Android.

Localization to Galician, Spanish, English, French, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese.

- Available now on App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/you-first-love-visual-novel/id1575192421
- Available now on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MelgoCinema.YouFirst

Written and directed by Roberto Alvite, starring Iris Darriba and himself, and produced by Melgo Cinema.

Visit the official website: http://www.youfirstgame.com

© Melgo Cinema SL. All rights reserved.
